name: Man Lung Yiu
content: Welcome to Ken Yiu's home page Ken M. L. Yiu Professor Department of Computing Hong Kong Polytechnic University Hung Hom, Kowloon Hong Kong Tel: +852 2766 7246 Office: PQ712 E-mail: csmlyiu AT comp DOT polyu DOT edu DOT hk I received the Bachelor Degree in Computer Engineering and the PhD Degree in Computer Science from the University of Hong Kong in 2002 and 2006, respectively. Then, I worked at Aalborg University from 2006 to 2009. I am currently a professor at Hong Kong Polytechnic University. My research focuses on databases, in particular query processing topics on spatiotemporal data and multidimensional data. Publications DBLP record To PhD applicants: please follow the procedure stated here; I do not reply to any unsolicited email.
